name: Whole Life Asset Management: how to do it and measure it
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: The most effective way to cut carbon emission is by careful lifecycle management of buildings. This includes measuring energy performance.This session examines effective ways and methods in which to measure and report on the sustainability of a building

presentations.name: Measuring and reporting on the sustainability of buildings
Effective methodologies in reporting and sharing
